detected_errors: End state inconsistency - object field has a different value: persistentvolumeclaim/default/persistence-rabbitmq-cluster-server-0["spec"]["resources"]["requests"]["storage"] is 15Gi after reference run, but 10Gi after testing run

bug_reproduction_test_plans/rabbitmq-ope.test_config_content:
workload: resize-pvc
actions:
- actionType: restartController

  trigger:
    definitions:

      condition:
        conditionType: onObjectDelete
        resourceKey: statefulset/default/rabbitmq-cluster-server
